description:
The investment seeks to provide current income and some capital appreciation.
 The fund seeks to achieve its investment objective by allocating its assets using a moderately conservative investment style that seeks to maximize the benefits of diversification, which focuses on investing a greater portion of fund assets in Fixed Income ETFs, but also provides some exposure to Equity ETFs. Specifically, the fund's target allocation is to invest approximately 25%-55% of its total assets in Equity ETFs and approximately 45%-75% of its total assets in Fixed Income ETFs. It is non-diversified.
